name: bomb egg
description:
bomb egg is a short game where you play as an egg and you blow things up with grenades.

fight enemies. talk to npcs. blow up said npcs. explode. defeat bosses. find secrets. tour the world.

WASD - move around

ARROW KEYS - dodge

SPACE - drop a grenade (run.)

E - interact

Q - map

originally created and released on april 2nd, 2016
